actors.name: United States of America
actors.description: Global superpower with dominant military, economic, technological, and cultural influence. Controls global financial systems, leads innovation, and shapes international policy.

actors.name: People's Republic of China
actors.description: Rising superpower with world's largest population, second-largest economy, growing military power, and expanding global infrastructure initiatives like Belt and Road.

actors.name: European Union
actors.description: Powerful economic and political alliance of 27 states, representing significant trade bloc, regulatory influence, and diplomatic power.

actors.name: Big Tech Consortium (Meta, Apple, Microsoft, Google, Amazon)
actors.description: Collective tech giants controlling global digital infrastructure, data, AI development, and online platforms that shape modern society.

actors.name: Federal Reserve System
actors.description: US central bank with enormous influence over global financial markets, monetary policy, and international economic stability.
